name: Magic Alchemist Springtime Ed.
description:
Springtime Edition of Magic Alchemist!

On your Springtime journey to become the most famous and glorious alchemist you have to merge objects until you discover the final and most mysterious Springtime item!

Magic Alchemist Springtime is an easy to learn game but nonetheless challenging. If you like Springtime and its gorgeous colors and flowers you will like this relaxing game.

* same gameplay rules as the original Magic Alchemist
* addictive gameplay
* colourful HD graphics
* beautiful graphic effects
* classical Springtime background music
* Springtime sound effects
* intuitive touchscreen controls
* local highscores for your device
* global highscores that are shared between all versions
* leave the game anytime and continue your session later
* Spring fever!
* Flowers!
* Easter bunny!
* relaxing

A free game with Springtime theme for hours of colorful fun and relaxing!

If you have suggestions for the Springtime Magic Alchemist or if you experience a problem with this free game please write to me: erdenkriecher@online.de.
